text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: It's a revenge match Selection Race! Uooooooooooooh～～～!!
Ever since the day I saw that expression on her face, as if it was a dream, Shinko Windy was enthusiastic and devoted herself to training.
It seemed like her immediate goal was to win the next Selection Race.
Since I was the one that convinced her, I would do what I could to support her. And that's why―

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Huuu-! That was a good run! My throat's all dry now. ――Hm?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: What's with this drink? 『For Windy-san』? Who's it from? ……Well, whatever, I'll just drink it!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Ugeh, it's really raining hard……! Can't even see 1m in front of me…… and here I was planning on doing some training too.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: I wonder if the gym's open? But, with this weather……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …………Hm? 『Reserved for Shinko Windy』? ……Why?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Whatever, it's fine! I'll go all out in the gym today!
And that's how the days continued, until…… the day of the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Huuーー……!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hm…… huh? That girl with the striped ribbon, I'm pretty sure she's been doing well lately……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Nuoo-!!
At the end of the last mock race, Shinko Windy was so distracted by her surroundings that she lost in the end.
That loss probably contributed to her anxiety and loss of self confidence, which led to a further decline in her concentration.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: H-…… Hmph, you don't need to tell me! Today, Windy-chan will win!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Selection Race, 1600m on dirt, heavy conditions in the rain. And now, the race begins!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa!
She didn't have trouble with her positioning. And while remaining calm, the race continued on. And then……

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And they've rounded the 4th corner on to the straight! They're competing for the front! Shinko Windy pushes forward!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (Like this, I can pull ahead! In one go, I'll take the lead!)
Shinko Windy's eyes were alive. She was putting strength in to her legs, and then――

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Do your best, just hold the lead until the goal!!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: They're pulling up behind you……! Go, do your best-!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (…… No no no, I need to focus!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (…… they said it clearly! That I'm talented, cool, and Japan's treasure! They're looking forward to my future!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (That I can win…… and just now, that they're counting on me……!!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Definitely…… I'll win, I'll win, I'll win! ……Windy-chan will win!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: I will wiiiiiiiin!!!
With enough force to crush anything in her path, she charged through the muck and mud――
Shinko Windy won.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Aww, she was so close…… but, that first place girl was amazing! Shinko Windy, was it? Her intensity was no joke!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was almost like she was a wild beast. I wonder when she's going to Debut? I'm looking forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Hehe, hehehe! Hehehehehehehehee!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: How was that!? Do you get it now!? Windy-chan is amazing!! ……Shi shi shi!
After Shinko Windy's race had ended…… I could feel the adrenaline rushing through my veins.
The intensity of spirit that could mow everything down. And above all, the determination to struggle forward to grasp victory.
I wanted her to gain confidence through victory, I wanted her to have fun running. Up until now, that was all I wanted, but――
choice_data_list: But there was one thing I had missed……

text_block_list.text: I had known she was talented. But that's not all. I was certain her growth going forward would be tremendous……!
By the time I made it to the dirt course, she was already surrounded by other trainers.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Eh? Scout? Eh? You too? For Windy-chan!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm! You guys all have good eyes on you! ……However! Windy-chan has already decided on her next victim――
I wanted to sign a contract with Shinko Windy. I desperately waved my arms to get her attention.
